SELECT chatr_partici.chatr_nm, chat.chat_no, chat.cntn, prj_partici_memb.nnm,chat.write_dt,chat.chatr_no,prj_partici_memb.prj_uni_no FROM chat LEFT OUTER JOIN chatr_partici ON chat.chat_partici_memb_uni_no = chatr_partici.chat_partici_memb_uni_no LEFT OUTER JOIN prj_partici_memb ON prj_partici_memb.partici_memb_uni_no = chatr_partici.partici_memb_uni_no WHERE prj_partici_memb.prj_uni_no = #{prjUniNo}
AND chat.cntn LIKE '%${cntn}%'

SELECT att.att_no, att.att_nm,brd.reg_dt, att.chat_no,chat.chatr_no, chatr_partici.partici_memb_uni_no, att.post_uni_no,post.division, post.ttl,brd.brd_uni_no, brd.prj_uni_no, att.todo_uni_no, todo.ttl, todo.prj_uni_no,post.division FROM att LEFT OUTER JOIN post ON att.post_uni_no = post.post_uni_no LEFT OUTER JOIN brd ON post.brd_uni_no = brd.brd_uni_no LEFT OUTER JOIN brd_cm ON post.brd_uni_no = brd_cm.board_uni_no LEFT OUTER JOIN prj_partici_memb pm ON pm.prj_uni_no = brd.prj_uni_no LEFT OUTER JOIN chat ON att.chat_no = chat.chat_no LEFT OUTER JOIN chatr_partici ON chat.chatr_no = chatr_partici.chatr_no LEFT OUTER JOIN todo ON att.todo_uni_no = todo.todo_uni_no WHERE (chatr_partici.partici_memb_uni_no = #{particiMembUniNo} OR (brd_cm.partici_memb_uni_no = #{particiMembUniNo} and brd.pubc_yn='N') OR (brd.pubc_yn='Y' AND pm.partici_memb_uni_no = #{particiMembUniNo}) OR (todo.cm = #{particiMembUniNo} OR todo.mgr = #{particiMembUniNo}))
AND att.att_nm LIKE '%${attNm}%'
